bug.author: donsmj
bug.description: Are there any evaluation criterias for MLP module in Autokeras?

comments.comment: Same question. After final_fit the MLP module, I'm wondering how to evaluate it performace since it doess't support 'evaluate' or 'predict'.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/droidadroit>@droidadroit</denchmark-link> Would you please take a look into this issue? Thanks.
